title: Lost and Found
description: She doesn't know his name, and she's only met him once, but Amy Johnson's "talent," clairvoyance, tells her he's her soul matethough she may never see him again.Then Amy is asked to use her talent to help solve the kidnapping of seventeen-year-old Nick Granger, and she reluctantly agrees, not sure she can trust her ability. From the first, however, Amy senses her connection to Nick is unusually powerfuland awfully familiar. Nick isn't the only one who will pay a terrible price if she can't find him. Amy must use her mind and her heart to unravel the kidnapping of her own true love.Author Biography: Cameron Dokey lives in Seattle, Washington.
author: Cameron Dokey
